name: BALLoon (itch) (CodeRedYT)
description:
WARNING - DIFFICULT GAME

Made for ScoreSpace #21 in 3 days!

BALLoon is a momentum-based platformer designed with speedrunning in mind. Bounce around and go fast to avoid the SHLUK and the SHLUKLINGS. Compete for the best time, and invent new speedrunning strategies to get ahead.

CONTROLS:
  • A&D OR Left Arrow & Right Arrow - Move left and right
  • S OR Down Arrow - Fall faster
  • Left Click OR Spacebar - Dash
  • Escape OR Left Ctrl - Pause
CREDITS:
  • CodeRed: Programming, level design, basically every besides art and music
  • Golden Disguise: Art and ideas man
  • Bluthardt: Music maker
  • Keegan Clark: Music remixer
